#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;


int main()
{int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
 int n,m;
 cin>>n>>m;
 char s[100000];
 cin>>s;   
    
    int i=0;int j,flag=0;
    int count=0;
    while(i<n)
    {count=0;
              if(s[i]=='#')
              {
              j=i;
              while(s[j]=='#' && j<n )
              {
                              count++;
                              j++;
                              }
              i=j;
              }
          //    cout<<"count"<<count<<endl;
              if(count>=m)
              {
                          flag=-1;
                          break;
                          }
              
              
              i++;
              }
    
    
    if(flag==-1)
    cout<<"NO"<<endl;
    else
    cout<<"YES"<<endl;
    
}
 //   getch();
    return 0;
}
